verses.verse: I will stand <WH5975> on my watch, <WH4931> and set <WH3320> me on the tower, <WH4692> and will watch <WH6822> to see <WH7200> what <WH4100> he will say <WH1696> to me, and what <WH4100> I shall answer <WH7725> when <WH5921> I am reproved. <WH8433>
And the LORD <WH3068> answered <WH6030> me, and said, <WH559> Write <WH3789> the vision, <WH2377> and make it plain <WH874> on tables, <WH3871> that he may run <WH7323> that reads <WH7121> it.

For the vision <WH2377> is yet <WH5750> for an appointed <WH4150> time, but at the end <WH7093> it shall speak, <WH6315> and not lie: <WH3576> though <WH518> it tarry, <WH4102> wait <WH2442> for it; because <WH3588> it will surely come, <WH935> it will not tarry. <WH309>
Behold, <WH2009> his soul <WH5315> which is lifted <WH6075> up is not upright <WH3474> in him: but the just <WH6662> shall live <WH2421> by his faith. <WH530>

Yes <WH637> also, <WH637> because <WH3588> he transgresses <WH898> by wine, <WH3196> he is a proud <WH3093> man, <WH1397> neither <WH3808> keeps at home, <WH5115> who <WH834> enlarges <WH7337> his desire <WH5315> as hell, <WH7585> and is as death, <WH4194> and cannot <WH3808> be satisfied, <WH7646> but gathers <WH622> to him all <WH3605> nations, <WH1471> and heaps <WH6908> to him all <WH3605> people: <WH5971>

Shall not all <WH3605> these <WH428> take <WH5375> up a parable <WH4912> against <WH5921> him, and a taunting <WH4426> proverb <WH2420> against him, and say, <WH559> Woe <WH1945> to him that increases <WH7235> that which is not his! how <WH5704> long? <WH5704> and to him that lades <WH3515> himself with thick clay! <WH5671>
Shall they not rise <WH6965> up suddenly <WH6621> that shall bite <WH5391> you, and awake <WH6974> that shall vex <WH2111> you, and you shall be for booties <WH4933> to them?

Because <WH3588> you have spoiled <WH7997> many <WH7227> nations, <WH1471> all <WH3605> the remnant <WH3499> of the people <WH5971> shall spoil <WH7997> you; because of men's <WH120> blood, <WH1818> and for the violence <WH2555> of the land, <WH776> of the city, <WH7151> and of all <WH3605> that dwell <WH3427> therein.

Woe <WH1945> to him that covets <WH1214> an evil <WH7451> covetousness <WH1215> to his house, <WH1004> that he may set <WH7760> his nest <WH7064> on high, <WH4791> that he may be delivered <WH5337> from the power <WH3709> of evil! <WH7451>
You have consulted <WH3289> shame <WH1322> to your house <WH1004> by cutting <WH7096> off many <WH7227> people, <WH5971> and have sinned <WH2398> against your soul. <WH5315>
For the stone <WH68> shall cry <WH2199> out of the wall, <WH7023> and the beam <WH3714> out of the timber <WH6086> shall answer <WH6030> it.
Woe <WH1945> to him that builds <WH1129> a town <WH5892> with blood, <WH1818> and establishes <WH3559> a city <WH7151> by iniquity! <WH5766>

Behold, <WH2009> is it not of the LORD <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635> that the people <WH5971> shall labor <WH3021> in the very <WH1767> fire, <WH784> and the people <WH3816> shall weary <WH3286> themselves for very <WH1767> vanity? <WH7385>
For the earth <WH776> shall be filled <WH4390> with the knowledge <WH3045> of the glory <WH3519> of the LORD, <WH3068> as the waters <WH4325> cover <WH3680> the sea. <WH3220>

Woe <WH1945> to him that gives his neighbor <WH7453> drink, <WH8248> that put <WH5596> your bottle <WH2573> to him, and make him drunken <WH7937> also, <WH637> that you may look <WH5027> on <WH5921> their nakedness! <WH4589>

You are filled <WH7646> with shame <WH7036> for glory: <WH3519> drink <WH8354> you also, <WH1571> and let your foreskin <WH6188> be uncovered: the cup <WH3563> of the LORD's <WH3068> right <WH3225> hand <WH3225> shall be turned <WH5437> to you, and shameful <WH7022> spewing <WH7022> shall be on <WH5921> your glory. <WH3519>

For the violence <WH2555> of Lebanon <WH3844> shall cover <WH3680> you, and the spoil <WH7701> of beasts, <WH929> which made them afraid, <WH2865> because of men's <WH120> blood, <WH1818> and for the violence <WH2555> of the land, <WH776> of the city, <WH7151> and of all <WH3605> that dwell <WH3427> therein.

What <WH4100> profits <WH3276> the graven <WH6459> image <WH6755> that the maker <WH3335> thereof has graven <WH6458> it; the molten <WH4541> image, <WH6755> and a teacher <WH3384> of lies, <WH8267> that the maker <WH3335> of his work <WH3336> trusts <WH982> therein, <WH5921> to make <WH6213> dumb <WH483> idols? <WH457>

Woe <WH1945> to him that said <WH559> to the wood, <WH6086> Awake; <WH6974> to the dumb <WH1748> stone, <WH68> Arise, <WH5782> it shall teach! <WH3384> Behold, <WH2009> it is laid <WH8610> over with gold <WH2091> and silver, <WH3701> and there is no <WH369> breath <WH7307> at all <WH3605> in the middle <WH7130> of it.
But the LORD <WH3068> is in his holy <WH6944> temple: <WH1964> let all <WH3605> the earth <WH776> keep silence <WH2013> before <WH6440> him.
